history.content: Hello, I just saw that the data science minor is now predicted to be approved in Fall 2019. Does that mean that I can also declare the data science minor in Fall 2019 if it gets approved (or would it only be available to declare in Spring 2020)? I am asking since I will be a senior next year and Fall 2019 would be my last semester to declare a minor, so I would like to enroll in courses based on whether I have a chance to declare the minor. Also, what are the chances of the minor actually getting approved in Fall 2019 and not being postponed again?
history.subject: Data Science Minor
